verses.text_plain: When Ephraim spake trembling, he exalted himself in Israel; but when he offended in Baal, he died.
verses.verse_html: 1When Ephraim spake trembling, he exalted himself in Israel; but when he offended in Baal, he died.

verses.text_plain: And now they sin more and more, and have made them molten images of their silver, and idols according to their own understanding, all of it the work of the craftsmen: they say of them, Let the men that sacrifice kiss the calves.
verses.verse_html:
2And now they sin more and more, and have made them molten images of their silver, and idols according to their own understanding, all of it the work of the craftsmen: they say of them, Let the men that sacrifice kiss the calves. ▼
▼ they sin…: Heb. they add to sin
 , ▼
▼ the men…: or, the sacrificers of men

footnotes.body_text: ▼ they sin…: Heb. they add to sin
footnotes.body_html: ▼ they sin…: Heb. they add to sin

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the men…: or, the sacrificers of men
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the men…: or, the sacrificers of men

verses.text_plain: Therefore they shall be as the morning cloud, and as the early dew that passeth away, as the chaff that is driven with the whirlwind out of the floor, and as the smoke out of the chimney.
verses.verse_html: 3Therefore they shall be as the morning cloud, and as the early dew that passeth away, as the chaff that is driven with the whirlwind out of the floor, and as the smoke out of the chimney.

tokens.text: Therefore they shall be as the morning

verses.text_plain: Yet I am the Lord thy God from the land of Egypt, and thou shalt know no god but me: for there is no saviour beside me.
verses.verse_html: 4Yet I am the Lord thy God from the land of Egypt, and thou shalt know no god but me: for there is no saviour beside me.

verses.text_plain: I did know thee in the wilderness, in the land of great drought.
verses.verse_html:
5I did know thee in the wilderness, in the land of great drought. ▼
▼ great…: Heb. droughts

verses.text_plain: According to their pasture, so were they filled; they were filled, and their heart was exalted; therefore have they forgotten me.
verses.verse_html: 6According to their pasture, so were they filled; they were filled, and their heart was exalted; therefore have they forgotten me.

verses.text_plain: Therefore I will be unto them as a lion: as a leopard by the way will I observe them:
verses.verse_html: 7Therefore I will be unto them as a lion: as a leopard by the way will I observe them:

tokens.text: Therefore I will be unto them as a lion

verses.text_plain: I will meet them as a bear that is bereaved of her whelps, and will rend the caul of their heart, and there will I devour them like a lion: the wild beast shall tear them.
verses.verse_html:
8I will meet them as a bear that is bereaved of her whelps, and will rend the caul of their heart, and there will I devour them like a lion: the wild beast shall tear them. ▼
▼ wild…: Heb. beast of the field

footnotes.body_text: ▼ wild…: Heb. beast of the field
footnotes.body_html: ▼ wild…: Heb. beast of the field

verses.text_plain: O Israel, thou hast destroyed thyself; but in me is thine help.
verses.verse_html:
9O Israel, thou hast destroyed thyself; but in me is thine help. ▼
▼ is…: Heb. in thy help

footnotes.body_html: ▼ is…: Heb. in thy help

verses.text_plain: I will be thy king: where is any other that may save thee in all thy cities? and thy judges of whom thou saidst, Give me a king and princes?
verses.verse_html:
10I will be thy king: where is any other that may save thee in all thy cities? and thy judges of whom thou saidst, Give me a king and princes? ▼
▼ I will…: rather, Where is thy king?

footnotes.body_text: ▼ I will…: rather, Where is thy king?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ I will…: rather, Where is thy king?

verses.text_plain: I gave thee a king in mine anger, and took him away in my wrath.
verses.verse_html: 11I gave thee a king in mine anger, and took him away in my wrath.

verses.text_plain: The iniquity of Ephraim is bound up; his sin is hid.
verses.verse_html: 12The iniquity of Ephraim is bound up; his sin is hid.

verses.text_plain: The sorrows of a travailing woman shall come upon him: he is an unwise son; for he should not stay long in the place of the breaking forth of children.
verses.verse_html:
13The sorrows of a travailing woman shall come upon him: he is an unwise son; for he should not stay long in the place of the breaking forth of children. ▼
▼ long: Heb. a time

footnotes.body_html: ▼ long: Heb. a time

verses.text_plain: I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes.
verses.verse_html:
14I will ransom them from the power of the grave; I will redeem them from death: O death, I will be thy plagues; O grave, I will be thy destruction: repentance shall be hid from mine eyes. ▼
▼ power: Heb. hand

verses.text_plain: Though he be fruitful among his brethren, an east wind shall come, the wind of the Lord shall come up from the wilderness, and his spring shall become dry, and his fountain shall be dried up: he shall spoil the treasure of all pleasant vessels.
verses.verse_html:
15Though he be fruitful among his brethren, an east wind shall come, the wind of the Lord shall come up from the wilderness, and his spring shall become dry, and his fountain shall be dried up: he shall spoil the treasure of all pleasant vessels. ▼
▼ pleasant…: Heb. vessels of desire

footnotes.body_html: ▼ pleasant…: Heb. vessels of desire

verses.text_plain: Samaria shall become desolate; for she hath rebelled against her God: they shall fall by the sword: their infants shall be dashed in pieces, and their women with child shall be ripped up.
verses.verse_html: 16Samaria shall become desolate; for she hath rebelled against her God: they shall fall by the sword: their infants shall be dashed in pieces, and their women with child shall be ripped up.
